channel.title: Alright, i get an error watch this plz?
channel.description:
well, lately i have been coding my own java apps :) woot, i just learned that swing/awt/listeners, exist :)
lol and i want to make a keylistener object to detect when a key is pressed inside the textfeild :) i have this code for that: [code] JTextField name = new JTextField(20); name.addKeyListener(this); [/code] i get this error [code]<identifier> expected[/code]
the error is under this: [code] name.addKeyListener(this); ^ [/code]
someone please help, i tried to be as informative as possible, im pretty sure this is an amateur mistake,
so please help a brother out.. lol ty
